original_title: Yellow Brick Road: The José Rodríguez Story
overview: José Rodríguez is a current PGA Tour golfer who had a miraculous and equally turbulent border-crossing experience as an undocumented Mexican immigrant in the mid-1990s. This film chronicles José's astounding personal journey, revealing an American Dream that's not always the fairytale it seems.
title: Yellow Brick Road: The José Rodríguez Story
